argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | m2cpminv.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | m2cpminv.k | |- K = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | m2cpminv.s | |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) |
| 4 |  | m2cpminv.i | |- I = ( N cPolyMatToMat R ) |
| 5 |  | m2cpminv.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_cpm2mf | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> I : S --> K ) |
| 7 | 3, 5, 1, 2 | #P_m2cpmf | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T : K --> S ) |
| 8 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_m2cpminvid2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ s e. S ) -> ( T ` ( I ` s ) ) = s ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ s e. S ) -> ( T ` ( I ` s ) ) = s ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A. s e. S ( T ` ( I ` s ) ) = s ) |
| 11 | 4, 1, 2, 5 | #P_m2cpminvid | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ k e. K ) -> ( I ` ( T ` k ) ) = k ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ k e. K ) -> ( I ` ( T ` k ) ) = k ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A. k e. K ( I ` ( T ` k ) ) = k ) |
| 14 | 6, 7, 10, 13 | #P_2fvidf1od | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> I : S -1-1-onto-> K ) |
| 15 | 6, 7, 10, 13 | #P_2fvidinvd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> `' I = T ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( I : S -1-1-onto-> K /\ `' I = T ) ) |
